sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper Win Cluster Node
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT tblSqlServerCluster.Id , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , 'Resource' AS Category , CAST(tblSqlServerCluster.Id AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblSqlServerCluster.Name)), '') AS Cluster_ID , CAST(tblSqlServerCluster.Id AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(TRIM(tblSqlServerCluster.Name)), '') AS Parent_CorrelationID , CAST(tblSqlServerCluster.Id AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(NodeInfo.NodeId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(NodeInfo.Name)), '') AS CorrelationID , 'Cluster' AS Subcategory , NodeInfo.Name AS [Name] , NodeInfo.Name AS ShortDescription
, NodeInfo.ClusterId , NodeInfo.AssetID , NodeInfo.Comments , NodeInfo.OperationalStatus , NodeInfo.DNSDomain , 'WinClusterNode' AS SourceName
, 'WinCluster' AS ParentAssetType , tblSqlServerCluster.Name AS ParentName , null AS ParentMACAddress , null AS ParentSerialNumber , 'Cluster of::Cluster' AS RelationType FROM tblSqlServerCluster INNER JOIN ( SELECT tblSqlServerClusterNOde.ClusterId , tblSqlServerClusterNode.Id NodeId , tblSqlServerClusterNode.Name , tblAssets.AssetID , tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments , tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus , tNetwork.DNSDomain AS DNSDomain FROM tblSqlServerClusterNOde LEFT OUTER JOIN tblSqlServers ON tblSqlServerClusterNOde.ID = tblSqlServers.ClusterId LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssets ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblSqlServers.AssetID
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssetCustom ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState ON tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tblNetwork.AssetID , tblNetwork.Description , DefaultIPGateway , DNSDomain FROM tblNetwork WHERE tblNetwork.IPEnabled = 1 and tblNetwork.DHCPenabled = 1 /* check this */ and (tblNetwork.DefaultIPGateway IS NOT NULL OR tblNetwork.DNSDomain IS NOT NULL) ) tNetwork ON tblAssets.AssetID = tNetwork.AssetID )NodeInfo ON tblSqlServerCluster.Id = NodeInfo.ClusterId
UNION ALL
SELECT tblWindowsCluster.WindowsClusterId , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , 'Resource' AS Category , CAST(tblWindowsCluster.WindowsClusterId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblWindowsCluster.Name)), '') AS Cluster_ID , CAST(tblWindowsCluster.WindowsClusterId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblWindowsCluster.Name)), '') AS Parent_CorrelationID , CAST(tblWindowsCluster.WindowsClusterId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(NodeInfo.NodeId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(NodeInfo.Name)), '') AS CorrelationID , 'Cluster' AS Subcategory , NodeInfo.Name AS [Name] , NodeInfo.Name AS ShortDescription
, NodeInfo.WindowsClusterId , NodeInfo.AssetID , NodeInfo.Comments , NodeInfo.OperationalStatus , NodeInfo.DNSDomain , 'WinClusterNode' AS SourceName
, 'WinCluster' AS ParentAssetType , tblWindowsCluster.Name AS ParentName , null AS ParentMACAddress , null AS ParentSerialNumber , 'Cluster of::Cluster' AS RelationType FROM tblWindowsCluster INNER JOIN ( SELECT tblWindowsClusterNode.WindowsClusterId , tblWindowsClusterNode.WindowsClusterNodeId NodeId , tblWindowsClusterNode.AssetName as Name , tblAssets.AssetID , tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments , tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus , tNetwork.DNSDomain AS DNSDomain FROM tblWindowsClusterNode LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssets ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblWindowsClusterNode.AssetID
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssetCustom ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState ON tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tblNetwork.AssetID , tblNetwork.Description , DefaultIPGateway , DNSDomain FROM tblNetwork WHERE tblNetwork.IPEnabled = 1 and tblNetwork.DHCPenabled = 1 /* check this */ and (tblNetwork.DefaultIPGateway IS NOT NULL OR tblNetwork.DNSDomain IS NOT NULL) ) tNetwork ON tblAssets.AssetID = tNetwork.AssetID )NodeInfo ON tblWindowsCluster.WindowsClusterId = NodeInfo.WindowsClusterId
